# Pull Request

## Summary
- What changed?
- Why was this change needed?

## Type of change
- [ ] feat (new feature)
- [ ] fix (bug fix)
- [ ] chore (tooling/dependencies/build)
- [ ] refactor (no behavior change)
- [ ] docs (documentation only)
- [ ] test (tests only)

## Testing
- [ ] App builds locally
- [ ] Unit tests pass locally
- [ ] Manually tested changed flow

## Screenshots / Recording
- [ ] N/A (no UI changes)
- Add screenshots or recording for UI changes.

## Risk and rollout
- Risk level: Low / Medium / High
- Rollout/rollback notes (if needed):

## Checklist
- [ ] No secrets/API keys added
- [ ] Backward compatibility considered
- [ ] Docs updated (if needed)
